Mod.name: lightpeeler
Mod.author: meso
Mod.description: classes and dmg based on arknights. first 3 letters of each class id indicate who they are.

Tips: Resistance is a percentage applied to Arts damage, reducing damage taken.
Defense is a flat reduction applied to Physical damage, reducing damage taken.
Hide in bushes and strike for an attack!

World.DefaultGameStartMessage: Yellow grants 30% physical resistance. Blue grants 30% Arts resistance. You can shoot over walls if you're near them.

gel.name: Neutrino
gel.description: Support DPS with AoE slow and passive regeneration.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: They wander in wait, fission in heart.

gel2.description: True heal allies by 1.2 health per second and reveal invisible opponents. Releasing will cast a weak Ohm's Law.
gel2.name: Potential Difference

gel3.description: Cast an overclock which will push and deal 4 Arts damage per hit. For ten seconds, targets will be more susceptible to knockback during the duration.
gel3.name: Short Circuit

bag.name: Plague
bag.description: Physical Burst with weakening and cooldown reduction.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Soft dreams in night, believing in an end.

bag1.description: Deal 10 physical damage. On hit, 2 physical damage will be dealt.
bag1.name: Viral Load

bag2.description: Reduce E cooldowns by 4 seconds. If a projectile collides, heal and cause targets to take 5 more physical damage.
bag2.name: Infectious Smile

bag3.description: For six seconds, Viral Load will shred 1 defense and deal 13 damage. Each target hit will reduce Infectious Smile cooldown. During the duration, the caster will take 4 more physical damage.
bag3.name: Toxic Exposure

effects.title: Passive
effects.text: Takes 35% less physical damage. Silence is half as effective. Heavy. Bound.

effects.title: Passive
effects.text: Takes 35% less Arts damage. Silence is half as effective. Heavy. Bound.

b.q.description: Slash and deal Tier V damage before dealing Tier V damage circularly. The damage will fall off at the edges.
b.q.name: Day

effects.title: Physical Damage
effects.text: Each tier of defense reduces physical damage taken by 10. A maximum of 95% damage can be negated.

b.w.description: Slash and deal Tier V damage before dealing Tier V damage circularly. The damage will fall off at the edges.
b.w.name: Day

effects.title: Physical Damage
effects.text: Each tier of defense reduces physical damage taken by 10. A maximum of 95% damage can be negated.

ceo.name: Meteorologist
ceo.description: Arts DPS with range and defense scaling.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Sunny forecast, yet no future in wait.

ceo1.description: Deal 8 Arts damage which will increase at a distance. An additional 3 Arts bleed damage will be dealt over 5 seconds.
ceo1.name: Forecasted Pain

ceo2.description: Repel targets away from the caster and gain 20% cooldown reduction. The buff will expire if a target enters the radius.
ceo2.name: Sunny Day

ceo3.description: For 4 seconds, the caster will be bound and Forecasted Pain will deal 110% damage with an additional +25% damage per 10 defense. Bleed damage will not be in effect. Once damaging an opponent, cooldowns will be lowered based on distance.
ceo3.name: Hurricane Warning

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Peer out and call to the endless expanse.

che3.description: Create a field. Targets which cross the edge of the field will silence in an area.
che3.name: Manhattan Module

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: The day begins, the wanderer wills; one is nevermore.

dor3.name: Dessert
dor3.description: Deal 5 slowing Arts damage. Holds 4 charges. Each mine will grant a permanent 30% attack buff.

exu.name: Reverent
exu.description: Physical DPS with multihits and health ramping.

exu2.description: Cause nearby allies to take 10% less physical damage. Fire Repentance once every 1.5s, independent of cooldown.
exu2.name: Redemption

exu3.description: For five seconds, Repentance will be silenced and fire two bullets. Repentance will deal 80% more damage, and will deal less damage per 25% health lost.
exu3.name: Rapture

eyj.name: Fisherman
eyj.description: Arts Burst with crowd control and shred.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: The dream of falsehood is a fallacy itself.

eyj2.description: Deal 10 Arts damage. Targets above half health will take 20 additional Arts damage which will use the target's attack buffs.
eyj2.name: Salmon's Blessing

eyj3.description: Deal 20 Arts damage that will reduce Arts resistance by 20% per hit.
eyj3.name: Fish Storm

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Encased in its walls is a signal untold.

gol1.description: Hold to deal 4 Arts damage per strike. At full charge, it will deal 16 Arts damage and silence Eluding Sun for 10 seconds.
gol1.name: Eluding Sun

gol2.description: Backstep. If a projectile would have collided, cast a flower that continously lowers Gladiolus cooldown.
gol2.name: Forget Me Not

gol3.description: If the caster's flowers are hit, deal 16 Arts damage. All skills will have its cooldown reset if the caster hits a drone.
gol3.name: Gladiolus

ire.name: Bonfire
ire.description: Mixed DPS with crowd-control and knockback.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: At the center of light is the core of separation.

ire2.description: Bind opponents. Silence previously bound targets.
ire2.name: Forest Fire

ire3.description: Deal 30 Arts damage over two seconds. Hit targets will be bound, phase through obstacles & take increased knockback.
ire3.name: A Burning Hill

kal.name: Visionary
kal.description: True DPS with healing and AoE.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: For the wanderer turns towards the silent sky.

kal1.description: Heal 20 health. On collision with Cataract, heal 10 health.
kal1.name: Astigmatism

kal2.description: Summon Cataract. The summon will deal 10 physical damage every second.
kal2.name: Cataract

kal3.description: For ten seconds, Cataract will deal true damage, orbit closer, and have a reduced attack interval; At the end of the duration, 20 true damage will be taken per enemy left alive. Gain a 100% damage buff which will decay over the skill duration.
kal3.name: Blurred Vision

lin.name: Mirror
lin.description: Physical Burst with clones and Arts damage.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Staring until its shadow's form is perceptible.

lin2.description: Create an Ephemeral Echo which will copy attacks.
lin2.name: Reflection, The Rain

lin3.description: Ephemeral Echoes will strike twice. Each hit will cause 6.5 Arts splash damage.
lin3.name: Reflection, The Downpour

lum.name: Astronomer
lum.description: Support Healer with invincibility and cleansing.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: And then they remember, the source of the dawn.

lum1.name: Starless Wonder
lum1.description: Heal 15 health and deal 8 physical damage. At increased distances, the healing will be reduced. Healed targets will not take lethal physical damage and will gain 5 defense.

lum2.name: Somewhere In My Dreams
lum2.description: Vanish and cleanse nearby allies. Levitate targets.

lum3.name: Soliloquy of Astral Thought
lum3.description: Decrease Starless Wonder cooldown. Healing will decrease while damage will increase over time. Recasting early will cancel the stance and heal 25 health.

mer.name: Belief
mer.description: Specialist with three major and minor gamestyles..

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: It is no longer gone, moreover on and on.

mer1.description: Deal 8 true damage and vanish the target.
mer1.name: Choral Weltschmerz

effects.title: Creed of Immolation
effects.text: Deals one-third damage; spreadshot with three hits

effects.title: Creed of Repentance
effects.text: Deals full damage; range and speed increased

effects.title: Creed of Salvation
effects.text: Deals half damage; bounces off obstacles and targets

effects.title: Figment of Connection
effects.text: Deals true damage; heals allies; slows

effects.title: Figment of Choice
effects.text: Deals Arts damage over time; homes

effects.title: Creed of Salvation
effects.text: Shifts nearby targets in the opposite direction

mer3.description: Hold to grant a Creed and a Figment that will last 7.5 seconds; teleport to the destination. Unable to shorten cycle.
mer3.name: Ionian Modulation

mos.name: Gambler
mos.description: Support Healer with stall and Arts resistance reduction.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Stand west in the dusk; out towards the east light.

mos1.description: Deal 3 Arts damage and regenerate 3 health to allies. Heal 0.3 health. Healing will be treated as Arts damage.
mos1.name: Rolled Odds

mos2.description: Targets in the radius will be slowed by 15% and randomly take 5% more Arts damage for 5 seconds.
mos2.name: Weighted Dice

mos3.description: Apply an omen to hit targets. Omens will shatter and deal 10 Arts damage globally if the target is under 20 health.
mos3.name: Lady Luck

mud.name: Pearlescent
mud.description: Support DPS with defense and shields. Regular healing is ineffective.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: The swan song of something more sings again.

mud1.description: Deal 7.5 physical damage. Charging will increase damage/healing dealt by 60% per second.
mud1.name: Light Heart

mud2.description: Gain 25 defense which will last one hit. Heal 2 true health if the shield is broken.
mud2.name: Daylight

mud3.description: If below half health, the caster will bind opponents and heal 10 true health. Otherwise, all allies will deal 10 physical damage.
mud3.name: Ancestor of Broken Sun

nih.name: Hummingbird
nih.description: Support Healer with Arts resistance and taunts.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: On the window, the wanderer perches, perturbed.

nih1.description: Deal 6 Arts damage and heal 2 health. Store two charges.
nih1.name: Prescription

nih2.description: Summon a bird which will taunt projectiles and deal 10 Arts damage on collision.
nih2.name: Triage

nih3.description: For ten seconds, Prescription will emit a large AoE which will heal 6 health and grant 40% Arts resistance.
nih3.name: Medical Service

pal.name: Fascination
pal.description: Support DPS with regeneration and positioning.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: False light peers through windows of passerby below.

pal1.name: Mania of Night
pal1.description: Deal 10 physical damage. Damage will be doubled after the first hit.

pal2.name: Lunar Hysterics
pal2.description: Heal nearby allies 9 health. Cooldown will be lowered on hit.

pal3.name: Fly Me to the Moon
pal3.description: For six seconds, grant allies reduced Q cooldown and 10 defense.

pha.name: Tragedy
pha.description: Physical Burst with mobility and bind.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: And yet the music starts once more, a different timbre from the last.

pha2.description: Deal 5 physical damage which will shred 3 defense per hit.
pha2.name: First Love

pha3.description: Dash. Deal 5 physical damage which will shred 3 defense per hit.
pha3.name: Late Spring

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: One final waltz in the camaraderie of life.

sag3.description: Deal 10 physical damage. Nearby targets will be marked. Gain 90% damage per target.
sag3.name: Radiance

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Although the sun is down, the clouds do not weep, its spirits high.

sai2.description: Grant 30 defense and true heal allies by 3 health per second. Group targets. Opponents will have 10% reduced damage in the radius. Picking up the flag will lower cooldowns.
sai2.name: Glass Soul

sai3.description: Bind, slow, and deal 10 physical damage. Opponents will have 10% reduced damage in the radius. Picking up the flag will lower cooldowns.
sai3.name: Bird in the Light

sar.name: Service
sar.description: Support Healer with slow and damage ramping.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Is it fury or silence which is truth among falsehood?

sar1.description: Deal 2 Arts and 6 physical damage over two strikes.
sar1.name: Cognition

sar2.description: Gain a 8% damage buff and a 16% healing buff.
sar2.name: Altruism

sar3.description: Over five seconds, the caster will heal 15 health. Enemies in the radius will have 90% movement speed and take 40% more Arts damage. Allies will heal 3 health over the duration.
sar3.name: Selfish Gene

ska.name: Vineyard
ska.description: Support DPS with trapping and true damage.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: The stupor is not, for the wanderer is sober.

ska1.description: True heal 1.5 health per second and taunt allied projectiles to a hit target.
ska1.name: Grapes..?

effects.title: True Damage
effects.text: True damage and healing is unaffected by defense or resistance.

ska2.description: Create a Wineglass at cursor which will true heal 1.5 health per second. The Wineglass will shatter and deal 6 true damage after an opponent or projectile collision.
ska2.name: Intoxicating

ska3.description: Heal and refire the taunt. For five seconds, healing fields will deal 2x true damage and grant allies +40% damage.
ska3.name: Drunken Stupor

sur.name: Allergen
sur.description: Arts Burst with lifesteal and immortality.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: The wanderer turns as does the earth.

sur2.description: On death, the caster will gain 100% lifesteal, double damage, and immortality for 5 seconds.
sur2.name: Necrosis

sur3.description: Heal. For 12 seconds, 60% less Arts and physical damage will be taken. Antibody will bounce, pierce, and decrease cooldown on hit. Over time, life drain will increase.
sur3.name: Cyst Formation

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: And yet the light is gone once more.

tho.name: Windchill
tho.description: Mixed DPS with blind and windup.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: Glimmering as gold in the sea of silver stars.

tho2.description: Deal 20 physical damage. On hit, vision will be obscured and Winter's Elegy will have a lower cooldown.
tho2.name: Prevading Snow

tho3.description: For five seconds, the caster will gain 45% cooldown reduction for Frostbite. After the second casting, the buff will become permanent.
tho3.name: Winter's Elegy

dou.name: Bombardier
dou.description: Physical Burst with area damage and bind support.

effects.title: Memory
effects.text: For itself, the wanderer, is a refugee of its accord.

dou1.description: Deal 20 physical damage in a wide area which will bind.
dou1.name: Shellshock

dou2.description: Attract all planted bombs and deal 10 true damage to bound targets. Bound targets will take 20% more damage and 3 more physical damage for 6 seconds.
dou2.name: Oopsies!

dou3.description: Deal 5 instances of 20 physical damage which will bind.
dou3.name: Jokes on You

wed.name: Nanofiber
wed.description: Arts Burst with physical damage and turrets.

wed2.description: Summon a turret which will repel opponents and break on hit.
wed2.name: Electrospin

wed3.description: Deal Arts damage and mark opponents. Turrets will also activate the blast. Marked opponents will take 15 Arts damage.
wed3.name: Compressed Materials
